description:
ABOUT THE GAME

After the space faring antics of Saints Row IV, many fans asked what we could do nextÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ the answer? Shoot The Devil in the face. Play as either Johnny Gat or Kinzie Kensington as you tear apart Hell in a quest to save the leader of the SaintsÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ soul. Historical icons, old friends, older enemies, a talking gun, a full length musical number, and a whole lot of other shenanigans all await you in the open world standalone expansion playground that is Saints Row: Gat Out Of Hell.

FEATURES

Play as Johnny Gat or Kinzie Kensington Ã¢â‚¬â€œ For the first time ever, play as the fan favorites Johnny Gat and Kinzie Kensington, alone or in 2-player online co-op.
An Open World from Hell Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Wage war against the Prince of Darkness through-out the 5 unique districts of hell any way you want: rescue allies, pick a fight with nightmarish Arch-Dukes, rob SatanÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s soul processing plantsÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ dozens of options await you in an all new city unlike any thatÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s been seen in Saints Row before.
New Supernatural Powers Ã¢â‚¬â€œThe acclaimed super powers of Saints Row 4 are back with a hellish twist Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Soar through the air on fallen angelÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s wings, summon devilish imps to attack your foes, and surround yourself in a divine aura that forces all to worship you.
Outrageous Weapons Ã¢â‚¬â€œ Put the 7 deadly sins to good use with an arsenal of underworld themed arms: fire exploding frogs at enemies, shoot swarms of locusts, and even deal destruction from afterlifeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s most comfortable (and lethal) armchair.
Kill Dex Ã¢â‚¬â€œ We promise you can do it this time. Pinky swear.
